metadata.title: Yousoon - Go out more, pay less
metadata.description: Discover the best deals near you. Bars, restaurants, leisure activities with exclusive discounts.

hero.title: Go out more,
hero.subtitle: Discover exclusive offers at the best bars, restaurants and leisure spots near you.

features.pageDescription: Discover everything Yousoon can do to make your outings unforgettable.

features.subtitle: An app designed to maximize your outings

exclusiveDiscounts.description: Access discounts negotiated exclusively for Yousoon members.

instantBooking.title: Instant booking

qrCheckin.description: Simply show your QR code at the entrance to enjoy your offer.

smartSearch.description: Find exactly what you're looking for with our advanced filters.

cta.description: Join over 500 partners who trust Yousoon to attract new customers.

benefits.title: Why become a partner?

step2.description: Add your establishments and create your first offers.

step3.description: Your offers are visible to all Yousoon users.

step4.description: Scan customers' QR codes to validate their bookings.

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: A complete partner dashboard to manage your business

pricing.title: Free to start
pricing.description: No registration fees or commissions. Create your offers and attract new customers.

about.title: Making outings accessible to everyone
about.subtitle: Yousoon was born from a simple belief: everyone should be able to enjoy quality outings without breaking the bank.

mission.title: Our mission
mission.description1: We believe that the best experiences shouldn't be reserved for an elite. That's why we created Yousoon: a platform that connects outing enthusiasts with the best venues in their city.
mission.description2: By negotiating exclusive offers with our partners, we enable everyone to discover new places, live new experiences, all while managing their budget.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We are passionate about outings and connections. That's what motivates us every day.

community.title: Community
community.description: We build a tight-knit community of enthusiasts who share their discoveries.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: We make quality outings accessible to everyone, regardless of budget.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly innovate to improve the experience of our users.

timeline.title: Our journey
timeline.subtitle: Key milestones in the Yousoon adventure

milestone1.title: The idea is born
milestone1.description: Birth of the concept during a night out with friends.

cta.title: Join the adventure
cta.description: Whether you're an outing enthusiast or a venue looking to grow your clientele, Yousoon is for you.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: A question, a suggestion? Our team is here to help.

success.title: Message sent!
success.description: Thank you for your message. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

faq.title: Have a question?
faq.description: Check out our FAQ for quick answers.

editor.content:
Yousoon SAS

director.title: Publication director
director.content: The publication director is [Name of director], in the capacity of President of Yousoon SAS.

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.content:
This site is hosted by:
Vercel Inc.
440 N Barranca Ave #4133
Covina, CA 91723
United States

intellectual.title: Intellectual property
intellectual.content: All content on this site (texts, images, videos, logos, icons, sounds, software, etc.) is the property of Yousoon SAS or its partners. Any reproduction, distribution, modification, or use of this content without prior written authorization is strictly prohibited and constitutes infringement under the Intellectual Property Code.

personal.title: Personal data
personal.content: The information collected on this site is processed by Yousoon SAS for managing requests and service provision. In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have rights of access, rectification, deletion, and portability of your data. For any questions, contact us at: privacy@yousoon.com

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: This site uses cookies to improve user experience. By continuing to browse, you accept the use of cookies. You can change your preferences at any time in your browser settings.

limitation.title: Limitation of liability
limitation.content: Yousoon SAS strives to ensure that the information on this site is accurate and up-to-date. However, we cannot guarantee the completeness or accuracy of the content. Yousoon SAS shall not be held liable for any damages resulting from site access or use.

law.title: Applicable law
law.content: This site is governed by French law. Any dispute relating to its use will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the French courts.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.intro: At Yousoon, we take the protection of your personal data very seriously. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

items.identity: Identity information: name, first name, date of birth
items.contact: Contact information: email address, phone number
items.technical: Technical data: IP address, browser type, device

legal.title: Legal basis
legal.content: Processing of your data is based on:

sharing.title: Data sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share your information with:

retention.title: Data retention
retention.content: We retain your data for the duration necessary for the purposes set out in this policy, and in any case no longer than:

items.account: Active accounts: duration of the relationship + 3 years
items.inactive: Inactive accounts: 3 years after last activity
items.legal: Legal obligations: as required by legislation

rights.title: Your rights
rights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

items.access: Right of access to your data
items.erasure: Right to erasure (right to be forgotten)

rights.contact: To exercise your rights, contact us at: privacy@yousoon.com

security.title: Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration. Our measures include end-to-end encryption, regular security audits, and strict access controls.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.content: We use cookies and similar technologies for:

items.essential: Essential cookies: necessary for site operation
items.personalization: Personalization cookies: to improve your experience
items.advertising: Advertising cookies: to display relevant ads (with your consent)

updates.title: Policy updates
updates.content: We may update this policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes via the app or by email.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For any questions about this privacy policy, contact us:

Yousoon SAS
Privacy Team
privacy@yousoon.com

Data Protection Officer: dpo@yousoon.com

terms.title: Terms of use
terms.intro: Welcome to Yousoon. By using our service, you agree to these terms of use. Please read them carefully.

items.service: "Service": the Yousoon mobile application and associated services
items.user: "User" or "Yousooner": any person using the Service
items.partner: "Partner": a professional establishment offering offers on the platform
items.offer: "Offer": a discount or advantage offered by a Partner
items.booking: "Booking": reservation of an Offer by a User

eligibility.title: Eligibility
eligibility.content: The Service is accessible to any adult capable of entering into a contract. Users must be at least 18 years of age.

registration.title: Account creation
registration.content: Access to certain features requires creating an account. You undertake to provide accurate and complete information and to keep it up to date.

verification.title: Identity verification
verification.content: Identity verification (via ID card) may be required to use certain features. This verification aims to guarantee service security.

plans.title: Available plans
plans.content: Yousoon offers different subscription plans, including a free plan with limited access and paid plans with all features.

payment.title: Payment
payment.content: Payments are processed exclusively via Apple Pay (iOS) or Google Pay (Android). By subscribing, you authorize automatic recurring billing.

cancellation.title: Cancellation
cancellation.content: You can cancel your subscription at any time. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period. No refunds will be given for the current period.

trial.title: Free trial
trial.content: New users may benefit from a free trial. At the end of the trial, your paid subscription will begin automatically unless cancelled before.

booking.title: Bookings
booking.content: Bookings are subject to Partner availability. Each booking generates a unique QR code valid only for single use.

checkin.title: Check-in
checkin.content: Check-in must be done on-site by presenting your QR code. The QR code is valid for 30 minutes after booking.

rules.title: Rules of conduct
rules.content: You agree to use the Service fairly, to respect Partners, and not to engage in any fraudulent behavior.

intellectual.title: Intellectual property
intellectual.content: All Service content (brand, logo, design, software) is the exclusive property of Yousoon SAS. Any unauthorized reproduction or use is prohibited.

yousoon.title: Yousoon's liability
yousoon.content: Yousoon acts as an intermediary between Users and Partners. We are not responsible for the quality of services provided by Partners.

user.title: User's liability
user.content: You are responsible for the use of your account and for respecting these terms. Any misuse may result in account suspension.

modifications.title: Modifications to the terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Significant changes will be communicated to you by email or via the application.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: You can delete your account at any time. Yousoon reserves the right to suspend or delete an account in case of violation of these terms.

law.title: Applicable law
law.content: These terms are governed by French law. Any dispute will be submitted to the exclusive jurisdiction of the French courts.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content:
For any questions about these terms:

Yousoon SAS
123 Avenue des Champs-Élysées
75008 Paris, France

legal@yousoon.com
